content:
321 It shouldn’t be illegal for me to sell my neighbor a pork chop or a pound of ground beef from an animal born, raised and processed on my farm.

I will not comply.

Food is fundamental to life and government shouldn’t be involved in a food transaction between neighbors. SAVE AMERICA posted 4 days ago by blue5707 18 comments award share report block Homesteading4sovereignty @sovernTranch • 6d It shouldn’t be illegal for me to sell my neighbor a pork chop or a pound of ground beef from an animal born, raised and processed on my farm I will not comply Food is fundamental to life and government shouldn’t be involved in a food transaction between neighbors
18 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web Hair Grows Back in A Few Days! At Any Stage of Baldness HaloGrow AfterGlow 13 points 4 days ago I'd be there and buying. permalink award report block reply shadypollster 8 points 4 days ago Yeah if I had a cool farmer neighbor who butchered I'd totally buy from them. permalink parent award report block reply Madnote1984 11 points 4 days ago The issue is that big agriculture producers lobby for more and more restrictions to undercut small farms and independent producers. Tyson chicken famously lobbied the USDA/FDA to pass vaccine mandates on chickens that cost them 10's of millions a year because they knew that market competitors couldn't afford the cost. It drove many of them out of the market. Now you've essentially got Tyson and Perdue controlling 95% of national poultry production. permalink award report block reply thelastlast 5 points 4 days ago and both companies are disgusting, both their chicken and to their workers permalink parent award report block reply NadlersNads 10 points 4 days ago How free were we ever? permalink award report block reply CommonSenseAmerican 2 points 4 days ago Before the internet there wasn't a snitch spyware device in everyone's pockets. It was more of a put up or shut up world. permalink parent award report block reply Flataxandmaga 9 points 4 days ago But that would cut out all those middle men. permalink award report block reply FatBeagleMars 1 points 4 days ago Amen brother! permalink parent award report block reply Waxfactory 5 points 4 days ago I seen this meme. Only 20 years ago on an expose on alex jones show. I hope all yall understand this defiance will be met with swift raids and executed on site livestock permalink award report block reply Waxfactory 4 points 4 days ago Also a big red and yellow sticker that says "this facility closed for non compliance " hope ya like that f350 in local impound, oh yea and bank of America line of credit closed. Enjoy starving who ite supremacist permalink parent award report block reply RedStoneDeepState 4 points 4 days ago Meat processing regulations need relaxed but to some degree should still exist. I would strongly prefer it to be de-regulated to the primal level for beef -  chuck, rib, loin, round, flank, plate, brisket, and shank - and for hogs shoulder, loin, belly, and leg. You can sell a whole brisket to your neighbor and they can grind it, but not ground beef. To be clear, I don't buy ground beef when I am in 3rd world countries for this reason. permalink award report block reply utfanx2 2 points 4 days ago Should of included the whole body in the 2nd and not just arms. Meat being necessary to the healthy consumption and welfare of a free state. You can sell a whole brisket to your neighbor and they can grind it, but not ground beef.
